joinAgree.sky.agree.all.text: Includes agreement to sign up with a verified ID, optional Location-based Service Terms, and optional agreement to receive event/benefit information.

loginForm.sky.captcha: Enter the security code in the image.

common.sky.newPw.success: Password change completed. You will be logged out from other devices.

help.sky.emailVerification.subject: [SKYBOARD] Here is your verification code request.
help.sky.emailVerification.body2: Make sure your verification email address matches the one you entered to receive the verification code.

email.sky.email.subject: [SKYBOARD] Here is your verification code request.
email.sky.email.content: Hello! This is Sky BOARD, where enjoyable communication exists.
email.sky.email.subContent1: Please enter the following verification code in the verification code input field.

log.sky.log.pw.chaContent: Find Password > Verify with Registered Email

myPage.sky.userName.change.role: (Nickname can be changed once a month.)

userJoinForm.userId: Only 5~20 characters of lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters (_, -) are allowed.
userJoinForm.userName: Nickname must be 2~8 characters excluding special characters.
userJoinForm.password: Please use 8~16 characters of uppercase/lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

newPwChk.NotBlank: Please enter the new password again for confirmation.

change.picture: Do you want to change your profile picture?

msg.loginUnblock: Overseas login restriction has been lifted.
msg.loginBlock: Overseas login restriction has been set.

device.logout: Do you want to log out from this device?
device.logoutSuccess: This device has been logged out.

msg.userActivityLogInfo: Provides password change history within the last 6 months.
msg.userLoginLogInfo: Login record provides up to 90 days of history with a maximum of 1,000 entries.

errorMsg.server: 잘못된 요청이거나 서버 오류 입니다 잠시후. 시도해주세요
